Articles.Content:
I got ksp in 2015 from the website. now  i want to play it on my new pc and after the download is complete, it corrupts and says "failed to download, forbidden". every time on every browser. i even tried on a virtual machine ubuntu and macOS as well. does anyone know how to fix this.

Thanks in advance.

1 hour ago, Vortechs299 said:

I got ksp in 2015 from the website. now  i want to play it on my new pc and after the download is complete, it corrupts and says "failed to download, forbidden". every time on every browser. i even tried on a virtual machine ubuntu and macOS as well. does anyone know how to fix this.

Thanks in advance.

Welcome to the forums! First of all, did you buy KSP from www.kerbalspaceprogram.com?

Feels like your anti-virus or anti-malware choking on the download. Though given you've tried on two different computers that might be pushed down on the list. What is your primary OS and primary browser?
i bought it from the official website
Hmm. Where did you place the download? Somewhere with a short name?
